org.jogger.router
Interface Routes

All Known Implementing Classes:
RoutesImpl
public interface Routes

Loads routes and exposes a method to find them.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary
 Route find(String httpMethod, String path)
          Tries to find a route that matches the method and path, retrieves or instantiates the controller and retrieves the method to be invoked.
 void load(InputStream inputStream)
          Loads the routes
 

Method Detail

load

void load(InputStream inputStream)
          throws ParseException,
                 RoutesException
Loads the routes

Parameters:
inputStream - the input stream from which we are going to load the route.
Throws:
ParseException - if there is a parsing error while parsing the input stream.
RoutesException - if there is a problem loading a controller.

find

Route find(String httpMethod,
           String path)
           throws RoutesException
Tries to find a route that matches the method and path, retrieves or instantiates the controller and retrieves the method to be invoked.

Parameters:
httpMethod - the HTTP method that we are going to use to find the route.
path - the path for which we are searching a route.
Returns:
an initialized Route if a route is found or null otherwise.
Throws:
RoutesException - if there is a problem loading the controller or the method.
